post: What is the best way to take care of a bonsai?

comments.comment: I recommend pruning regularly and ensuring it's in a spot with enough sunlight.
Make sure the soil is well-draining and water it only when the soil is dry.

post: What substrate is best for cacti and succulents?

comments.comment: A well-draining cactus mix is ideal, with added sand for extra drainage.
I use a mix of cactus soil and perlite, and it works really well!
